channel.title: Attention newbies
channel.description:
WHISPERING DOES NOT EQUAL UNSEEN/CULT
unseen and cult get a night chat that no one else can read, so rarely need to whisper. On the other hand, the only way besides prince for BD to communicate privately is whispers, so they whisper.
This post brought to you by someone randomly executed by a prince because I whispered.

item.title: Attention newbies
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
Let the guy thank the creator of the thread in peace reeee3

Read full topic

item.title: Attention newbies
item.dc:creator: milesmsith
item.description:
ummm! thats what i want Thank you so much for this. I was into this issue and tired to tinker around to check if its possible but couldnt get it done. Now that i have seen the way you did it, thanks guys
with
regards
miles msith
https://hotstar.onl/ kodi

Read full topic

item.title: Attention newbies
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I always wispier a lot as king and use my non-scum checks as a bargaining chip. I do this regardless of my alignment. I will probably keep doing this after the next patch because it is still a good bargaining chip.

Read full topic

item.title: Attention newbies
item.dc:creator: Finitethrills
item.description:
There’s also a good chance they are talking to their lead generators. BD is always way too willing to vote whisperers up for class, and too ready to execute early on if someone doesn’t want to claim… Leading to them getting their own investigatives killed or converted, especially if they manage to confirm their claim. I’ve won so many games for unseen because of BD forcing me to out myself as sheriff, getting me converted, and then believing every word I say afterwards because they confirmed me.

Read full topic

item.title: Attention newbies
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Doesn’t necessarily mean that. They could actually be a good king that has been convinced that the scum they are whispering to are something good. Something that helps the scum out a lot when the king is out of ally checks

Read full topic

item.title: Attention newbies
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Well yeah, but king that wishpering too much and not doing anything else usuly means that he is telling unseen/cult what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Attention newbies
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Yeah, whispering is rarely scum-scum

Read full topic
